text:
Anyone with access to JuliaData or YAML.jl (<@U8JP5B9T2>?), there are a few very simple PRs that could use merging:
- <https://github.com/JuliaData/YAML.jl/pull/96> (print empty collections properly)
- <https://github.com/JuliaData/YAML.jl/pull/109> (fix 1.0 support)
- <https://github.com/JuliaData/YAML.jl/pull/110> (update CI badge)
- <https://github.com/JuliaData/YAML.jl/pull/111> (fix writing of single-line strings with dollar signs)

text: I added you as a maintainer

elements.text: I added you as a maintainer

text: Might need you to do one thing though (or give me appropriate permissions to do it myself): Travis CI is currently a "required check" to merge PRs but it's hanging presumably because the org is out of credits.

elements.text: Might need you to do one thing though (or give me appropriate permissions to do it myself): Travis CI is currently a "required check" to merge PRs but it's hanging presumably because the org is out of credits.

text: I think the required checks should be in `/settings/branches`

/settings/branches

text: :thumbsup::thumbsup::thumbsup: glad to have someone else on board

elements.text: glad to have someone else on board

but for now there's none

text: Yeah I'd be fine with you adding that

text: Oh, did we not get github actions setup?

elements.text: Oh, did we not get github actions setup?

text: or do we just still have travis there? we can just remove travis, it's not going to be useful anymore

text: GHA is running, the Travis required check was just not removed

text: OK, added julia 1 on all platforms. We appear to have 2 CompatHelper files, a `.yaml` and a `.yml`
